title: 2 ba, 2nd floor, move in special, quiet, large, remodeled, hills
posting_body: ['Move in special of up to 2 weeks free with 1 year lease.', 'The beautiful quiet spacious1200 square foot remodeled 2nd floor apartment has', '2 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, and a large private balcony.', 'The living room and two bedrooms have new naturally sealed hardwood floors.', 'Beautiful floor tiles are in the kitchen, bathrooms, entry, and hallway.', 'The large kitchen has a dining area, beautiful granite counters,', 'a 30" smooth top stove, and a powerful new fan hood.', 'The large living room has a lovely brick fireplace.', 'Bedroom and bathroom windows and balcony door are dual pane.', 'The large bedrooms have big double closets with mirror doors.', 'Entry closet and hallway linen closet are sizeable.', 'The building is totally enclosed with dual pane windows and doors', 'in the front, back, and hallways so that it is warmer in the winter', 'and cooler in the summer.', 'Elevator goes to all floors from the covered car parking lot.', 'Beautiful natural stone tiles are in the hallways, swimming pool, and', 'areas around pool.', '2 parking places include 1 covered spot.', 'The apartment is near the 101 and 280 freeways.', 'Hiking trail is a half a block away.', 'Pictures are similar but may not be exact.', 'Good credit', '$2600 deposit', 'Water and garbage included', '$250 pet deposit for each cat', 'No smoking indoors', 'Please do not text.', 'Angelo:', '650', '773', '5673']
